ApplicationStatus ApplicationStatus Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Specifies the status of the application.

Edit

In this Article

public enum ApplicationStatusPublic Enum ApplicationStatus

Fields

Creating Creating

Currently being created.
Deleting Deleting

Currently being deleted.
Failed Failed

Creation or deletion was terminated due to persistent failures.
Invalid Invalid

Invalid.
Ready Ready

Ready.
Upgrading Upgrading

Currently being upgraded.
